name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Collection - Prepurchase
name_original: The Elder Scrolls Online: Collection - Prepurchase
description:
Pre-purchase The Elder Scrolls Online Collection and get immediate access to the full base game, Morrowind Chapter, and included DLC game packs. Also includes the Summerset Chapter, available on June 5, 2018. Your pre-order includes a bonus Nightmare Senche in-game mount, and the Queen's Bounty Pack, available once Summerset launches.

• BEGIN YOUR ADVENTURE – Chaos reigns over Tamriel as ancient enemies band together to bring ruin to the mortal world. Take up arms and fight for Tamriel’s salvation. 
• SAVE MORROWIND – Return to the island of Vvardenfell and help a demi-god regain his lost powers. 
• JOURNEY TO SUMMERSET – For the first time in history, the home of the High Elves opens its borders to foreign visitors. Travel to Summerset and unravel a dark conspiracy that threatens the world’s existence.
• BONUS DLC PACKS – Enjoy new stories, skill lines, zones & more with the Imperial City, Orsinium, Thieves Guild, and Dark Brotherhood DLC.
